phrs.translation: 英国种大苹果, 考斯塔德, 大苹果的一种

sentences.sentence: Costard: o, they have lived long on the alms -basket of words.
sentences.translation: 考斯·特德：噢，他们在词语的施舍篮里生活得还真是久啊。

sentences.sentence: Drs Forget and Costard and Professor Lognonné introduce a new world and reveal the workings of the planet Mars.
sentences.translation: DRS Forget和考斯塔德博士和教授Lognonné引入一个新的世界，揭示火星的运作。
